channel.title: Tech Stack on
channel.description: Recent content in Tech Stack on

item.title: Tech Stack
item.description: Speech Synthesis # SpeechNinja is powered by TTSReader’s Engine, which is in its turn powered by the Web Speech API. Hosting # Hosted by github pages. Github project repository is here https://github.com/ttsreader/speechninja App technology # The app itself is built on JavaScript, using npm. The code behind it is not open source. Site technology # The website around the app, landing page, docs, etc. is based on Doks which is an amazing open source Hugo theme.
